text: Braudabad railway station (, Sindhi: برائود آباد ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Braudabad village, Thatta district of Sindh province, Pakistan. ==Services== The following trains stop at Braudabad station: ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways *Map Braudabad Category:Railway stations in Thatta District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Braudabad railway station
